did.unittitle: A history of the Philadelphia theatre for 1878, 1879 and a check list of plays, 1878-1890

repository.corpname: The New York Public Library. Billy Rose Theatre Division.

address.addressline: New York Public Library for the Performing Arts, Dorothy and Lewis B. Cullman Center

did.abstract: Thomas F. Marshall, author. Essential portion of thesis (P.H.D.)-- University of Pennsylvania, 1941. Published in Philadelphia, 1943. Consists of two sections, a commentary which focuses on the period 1878-1879, and a "Day-Book" which attempts to list all plays, musicals, and minstrel shows which appeared in Philadelphia between 1878 and 1890.

scopecontent.p: Essential portion of thesis (P.H.D.)-- University of Pennsylvania, 1941. Published in Philadelphia, 1943. Consists of two sections, a commentary which focuses on the period 1878-1879, and a "Day-Book" which attempts to list all plays, musicals, and minstrel shows which appeared in Philadelphia between 1878 and 1890.

prefercite.p: A history of the Philadelphia theatre for 1878, 1879 and a check list of plays, 1878-1890, Billy Rose Theatre Division, The New York Public Library
